name: Don't Answer
description:
Don't Answer is a short horror indie game made by one Developer at Skybox Interactive. This is the first game i will be releasing.

DON'T ANSWER (2022) - The Story:

17 years later, after your own family was murdered by what seemed to be someone or something that hasn't been found to this day. You decide that you are going to go live at that house to honor the memory of your parents... And decide to start working a case on it to see if you can finally find out who killed them. You start to question if this was the right decision or not after you hear knocks on the door.

Uncover the truth of the murder of your parents in this Story-telling nerve-wrecking Horror game.
